snow.skittles

Class TextSkittle

  • java.lang.Object
    • snow.skittles.TextSkittle

  • public class TextSkittle
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for creating text skittle, exposes methods for modifying the look of the text view, many more to come

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextSkittle(android.content.Context context, android.view.ViewGroup parent)
      Use this constructor for convenient addition of the text skittle
      TextSkittle(TextSkittleContainer textSkittleLayout)
      Used internally, Use the above constructor in your activities
